title: stuck in the client "Authenticating"
body: only my account have this issue and I have this issue for 2days. plz riot fix up this problem quickly  :( {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  Per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) guide, there's been some downtime with a few phases of maintenance.  Let me know.
